name: 42 vs. Evil
description:
In this game you control Agent 42, an ex punk rocker who fights Evil since his band broke up.

The local graveyard is full of re-animated skeletons, some are very bad, some are kinda cool (or they think they are), you have two guns and virtually (actually, literally) infinite ammo, but not infinite health or battery power for your torchlight!

  • 3 procedurally generated maps with a new enemy type at each step
  • 3 "secret" puzzle maps
  • 3 (+1) boss fights
  • a bunch of silly cutscenes

Inspired by eternal pearls such as Evil Dead 2 and Army of Darkness and by the authors' ongoing Monster Of The Week tabletop campaign.

Game code and assets available on Github.
